code: import'./Footer.css';import React from'react';import{FontAwesomeIcon}from'@fortawesome/react-fontawesome';import{faFacebook,faLinkedin,faGithub,faInstagram}from"@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Footer=function Footer(){/* SOCIALS STATIC DATA */var socialDetails=[{/*icon: faFacebook, link: '' */},{icon:faLinkedin,link:'https://www.linkedin.com/in/godsheritage/'},{icon:faGithub,link:'https://github.com/Godsheritage'},{icon:faInstagram,link:'#'}];/* GET CURRENT YEAR */var currentYear=new Date().getFullYear();/* RENDER SOCIAL ICONS */var getSocials=function getSocials(){return socialDetails.map(function(social,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{rel:"noopener noreferrer",href:social.link,target:"_blank",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(FontAwesomeIcon,{className:"social-icon",icon:social.icon})},index);});};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-footer-container",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"main-footer-content",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-footer-message",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[" All rights reserved \xA9  ",/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"selected-header-option",children:"'"}),"Godsherit",/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"selected-header-option",children:"age"})]})," ",currentYear," "]})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"main-footer-socials",children:getSocials()})]})});};export default Footer;
